price: نو نن به په هيچا هيڅ ظلم ونه شي او نه به ستاسو له خپلو عملو پرته د بل څه بدله دركړى شي.
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا تُظۡلَمُ نَفۡسٞ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma lā tuẓ'lamu nafsun shayan walā tuj'zawna illā mā kuntum taʿmalūna
